bioconda.name: bioconductor-hmmcopy
bioconda.summary: Copy number prediction with correction for GC and mappability bias for HTS data

biocontainers.name: hmmcopy
biocontainers.summary: C++ based programs for analyzing BAM files and preparing read counts -- used with bioconductor-hmmcopy

biotools.summary: Corrects GC and mappability biases for readcounts (i.e. coverage) in non-overlapping windows of fixed length for single whole genome samples, yielding a rough estimate of copy number for further analysis.  Designed for rapid correction of high coverage whole genome tumour and normal samples.
